column1: Which description is a best fit for Scrum?
column2: Analysis design coding test steps in the given order and using multiple iterations

column1: An abstract class is which of the following?
column2: A class that has no direct instances but whose descendants may have direct instances

column1: Which one of the following explains the following statement? Same operation may apply to two or more classes.

column2: Analysis design coding test steps in the given order and going through the steps no more than one time

column1: Aggregation is which of the following?
column2: Expresses a part-of relationship and is a stronger form of an association relationship.

column1: The benefits of object-oriented modeling are which of the following?
